name: Apple Grapple (Requires Tilt Five)
description:
Put on your Tilt Five glasses and flex your apple harvesting skills! Collect as many falling apples as you can within 60 seconds. Keep an eye out for valuable Golden Apples and avoid collecting any Bad Apples! Apple Grapple was made at Ludum Dare 52, the theme was "harvest".

Features:

  • Quick, casual gameplay for Tilt Five
  • Mixcast support
  • Custom music and sound effects

Credits: 

  • Music & SFX: Jonathan Marlin
  • Everything else: Justin Palmer
